name: A pair of boots made from red dragon scales
data: It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution like a god.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'kick'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'flip kick'.
